desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.thai: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.ko: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_tw: 由于和風紀委員會的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。對策委員會决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.thai: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.ko: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.thai: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.ko: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_tw: 老师突然将视线与遙香的对上了。遙香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然将视线与春香的对上了。春香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

desc.zh_tw: 亚子首先为風紀委員會发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望對策委員會将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。綾音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏萊的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.

Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.

Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而對策委員會突然受到遙香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏萊，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，風紀委員會担心夏萊这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.

desc.zh_tw: 佳世子希望亞瑠尽快离开，但亞瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.jp: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.thai: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.ko: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.
desc.zh_tw: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳世子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳世子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.

desc.en: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围對策委員會，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.jp: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.thai: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.ko: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.zh_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时綾音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.jp: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.

Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的對策委員會一行人面前。對策委員會趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.thai: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.

desc.zh_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的對策委員會一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亞瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，對策委員會几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.

desc.zh_tw: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。對策委員會将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.jp: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.thai: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.ko: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.zh_tw: 綠和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绿和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绿和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绿和桃想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.

As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井与綠开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃井稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃井随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井与绿开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃井稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃井随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃与绿开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井为了阻止遊戲開發部被废社，于是便把愛麗絲带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的愛麗絲，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。綠可怜愛麗絲，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，愛麗絲因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. desc.zh_tw: 桃井将愛麗絲带回到社团活动室，綠非常惊诧。愛麗絲因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让愛麗絲伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_tw: 这次和上次不同，由于愛麗絲的大展身手，遊戲開發部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。

desc.en: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.thai: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.ko: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。綠提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在愛麗絲与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.thai: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.ko: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。愛麗絲在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.thai: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但愛麗絲却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着愛麗絲，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.thai: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.ko: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_tw: 电脑认出了愛麗絲，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.thai: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.ko: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵去见研討會的部长莉音。两人在谈论先前遊戲開發部与C&C发生的事，并且针对愛麗絲的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于愛麗絲立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来陽葵遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵去见研讨会的部长莉音。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来阳葵遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.thai: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".

desc.zh_tw: 莉音和陽葵共同策划了遊戲開發部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了愛麗絲的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为愛麗絲是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而陽葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵固守着自己的结论，与莉音产生了严重分歧。莉音试图用AMAS将陽葵困住，但陽葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.jp: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.thai: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.ko: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.zh_tw: 桃香指出，兩小時前，在基沃託斯各地觀測到了數個能量濃度極高的能量體――尤其是，在聖所之塔正中央，他們所處的地方，也有一個，但沒人能目視觀察到它。桃香主張是感測器故障，但琳不這麼認為。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香指出，两小时前，在基沃托斯各地观测到了数个能量浓度极高的能量体――尤其是，在圣所之塔正中央，他们所处的地方，也有一个，但没人能目视观察到它。桃香主张是传感器故障，但琳不这么认为。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃香指出，两小时前，在基沃托斯各地观测到了数个能量浓度极高的能量体――尤其是，在圣所之塔正中央，他们所处的地方，也有一个，但没人能目视观察到它。桃香主张是传感器故障，但琳不这么认为。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃可指出，两小时前，在基沃托斯各地观测到了数个能量浓度极高的能量体――尤其是，在圣所之塔正中央，他们所处的地方，也有一个，但没人能目视观察到它。桃可主张是传感器故障，但琳不这么认为。

desc.en: 琳確認現在發生緊急情況，要求召集各地區的學生會代表，共同商討應對方案。她將以代理會長的許可權發動緊急協議，成立基沃託斯緊急對策委員會。
desc.jp: 琳確認現在發生緊急情況，要求召集各地區的學生會代表，共同商討應對方案。她將以代理會長的許可權發動緊急協議，成立基沃託斯緊急對策委員會。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳确认现在发生紧急情况，要求召集各地区的学生会代表，共同商讨应对方案。她将以代理会长的权限发动紧急协议，成立基沃托斯紧急对策委员会。

desc.en: 步擔心琳這一次可能更加激發學生們對琳的代理會長許可權濫用的聲討，尤其是這可能侵犯了防衛室的許可權。琳執意繼續釋出，就在這時財務室的碧來到控制室。
desc.jp: 步擔心琳這一次可能更加激發學生們對琳的代理會長許可權濫用的聲討，尤其是這可能侵犯了防衛室的許可權。琳執意繼續釋出，就在這時財務室的碧來到控制室。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 步担心琳这一次可能更加激发学生们对琳的代理会长权限滥用的声讨，尤其是这可能侵犯了防卫室的权限。琳执意继续发布，就在这时财务室的碧来到控制室。

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 碧指責琳在擔任代理會長期間的各種出格事情，例如關閉SRT和接受“夏萊”這一組織，指出她已經濫權。碧警告稱，如果琳無法給出有說服力的證據，她可能會把琳冠以“試圖私有化聯邦學生會”的罪名，並希望她再三考量。碧隨後離開。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 碧指责琳在担任代理会长期间的各种出格事情，例如关闭SRT和接受“夏莱”这一组织，指出她已经滥权。碧警告称，如果琳无法给出有说服力的证据，她可能会把琳冠以“试图私有化联邦学生会”的罪名，并希望她再三考量。碧随后离开。

desc.en: 琳來到控制室外，遇到防衛室部長香耶。香耶表示自己無心插手事情，並認為琳有許可權發起緊急對策委員會。香耶同時建議琳把夏萊的力量加入其中，琳接受了建議。香耶主動幫助接送老師，表示將安排女武神進行。
desc.jp: 琳來到控制室外，遇到防衛室部長香耶。香耶表示自己無心插手事情，並認為琳有許可權發起緊急對策委員會。香耶同時建議琳把夏萊的力量加入其中，琳接受了建議。香耶主動幫助接送老師，表示將安排女武神進行。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳来到控制室外，遇到防卫室部长香耶。香耶表示自己无心插手事情，并认为琳有权限发起紧急对策委员会。香耶同时建议琳把夏莱的力量加入其中，琳接受了建议。香耶主动帮助接送老师，表示将安排瓦尔基丽进行。

desc.en: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。

desc.en: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。

desc.en: 就在小春被包圍時，彌香闖了進來。儘管仍然被人謾罵為“叛徒”，但彌香並無理會，而是投入戰鬥中。

desc.en: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 艦長琳被特意準備了一個大衣。陽葵表示這些服裝經過改造後，不僅實現了生理監測，同時還具備防火之類的功能。雖然有些人對這套服裝仍頗有微詞，不過琳很快平息衝突，進入正題。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 舰长琳被特意准备了一个大衣。日鞠表示这些服装经过改造后，不仅实现了生理监测，同时还具备防火之类的功能。虽然有些人对这套服装仍颇有微词，不过琳很快平息冲突，进入正题。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.jp: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。

desc.zh_tw: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳宣布枫香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。枫香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对枫香而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳宣布风华同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风华对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风华而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供给部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳宣布风香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风香而言并没有什么吸引力。明里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。

desc.en: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。

desc.zh_tw: 琳是聯邦學生會的副會長，在新手教程以及終章中出現過。

desc.en: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？

desc.en: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人對白子逃走感到很不開心，不過星野表示，既然白子要來妨礙老師破壞方舟，那麼他們只需要繼續破壞，讓她繼續出現即可――到時也不難。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: 外圍3區次元引擎被破壞，白子再次撤退了。優香駭入中央地區後連線通訊，把在中央地區發現戴著面具的白子的事實轉達給大家。為了救出白子，老師和學生們準備迎接最後的一場戰役。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 眾人聯絡上了真正的白子。白子解釋稱自己是在騎車路上被綁架的，起初還以為他們是為了要贖金，所以就戴上了面罩。星野督促白子取下，並重申了她之前的話。眾人要白子在那裡乖乖等候，他們馬上就到。白子答應，眾人立刻出發。

desc.en: 中央區――也就是第四區域，是方舟的最後一個區域。陽葵指出，白子被關押的地方由特殊安全系統保護，其因與外界隔離無法駭入。對策委員會主動承擔了破壞的任務。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.ko: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
